1.formula:
=html.5x12("
Spreadsheet users can build and deploy their own operational systems without technical help with Vixo.
  • share operational data easily and make better, quicker and cheaper decisions
  • collect, collate and aggregrate data securely and accurately from staff, colleagues and customers

1.value:
Spreadsheet users can build and deploy their own operational systems without technical help with Vixo.
  • share operational data easily and make better, quicker and cheaper decisions
  • collect, collate and aggregrate data securely and accurately from staff, colleagues and customers

1.formula: =img("/img/full-top-panel-rev.png", "share, enter data and aggregate with bosses, partners and colleagues", 1)
